introduction.para: To copy a 3D Maps screen to another application like Microsoft Word or PowerPoint, you can capture what’s shown on the 3-D screen and paste it in a Word document or PowerPoint presentation as a static picture.

listItem.para: In 3D Maps, move around on your map to show exactly what you want to capture.
This copies the screen capture to the Clipboard.
In the other application, click where you want to paste the screen capture and press Ctrl+V.

alert.para: If you want to show an entire 3D Maps tour in a PowerPoint presentation, you can create a video of the tour and insert it in a PowerPoint slide.
